name: Create a new payment in Stripe from a Typeform form response and send an invoice
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in Typeform, a new payment intent will be instantly created in Stripe and an invoice will be sent via Gmail.

The template expects your Typeform form to collect the following information:
1) Email 
2) Name
3) Amount
4) If you collect payments in different currencies, you also need a 'Currency' field - to be filled out with the three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iban.com/currency-codes).
